name: Relayer
description: Safe Relayer - A relayer for Safe multisig wallet.

parameterDecorators.name: _maxPriorityFee
parameterDecorators.description: New MaxPriorityFee clients will be paying.

functionDecorators.name: owner
functionDecorators.description: Returns the address of the current owner.

functionDecorators.name: recoverFunds
functionDecorators.description: Recover tokens sent by mistake to this contract. Ether recovery is not implemented as contract is not payable.

functionDecorators.name: relay
functionDecorators.description: Relay a transaction and get refunded. It's responsability of the sender to check if the Safe has enough funds to pay.

parameterDecorators.name: functionData
parameterDecorators.description: ABI encoded Safe `execTransaction` without the method selector.

functionDecorators.name: renounceOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

parameterDecorators.name: _token
parameterDecorators.description: Token for paying refunds. Should be the wrapped version of the base currency (e.g. WETH for mainnet).

parameterDecorators.name: _maxPriorityFee
parameterDecorators.description: MaxPriorityFee clients will be paying, so relayer cannot be abused to drain user funds.

parameterDecorators.name: _relayerFee
parameterDecorators.description: Relayer fee that will be added to the gasPrice when calculating refunds.

parameterDecorators.name: _method
parameterDecorators.description: Method id that will be called on the Safe.

functionDecorators.name: transferOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.
